title: Ranking for Scientific Literature (Web of Science)
description: Rank most influential researchers & opinion leaders in the scientific community

input.name: quid_KOL_webofscience_input.csv
input.description: CSV export from Quid Opus network of Web of Science data

output.name: quid_webofscience_output.xlsx
output.description: CSV export from Quid Opus network of Web of Science data

input_description: CSV export from Quid Opus network of Web of Science data
output_description: Ranked list of key opinion leaders based on metrics such as number of publications, frequency of citation, co-authorship, and breadth of influence

title: KOL Ranking for News & Blogs
description: Rank most influential opinion leaders mentioned in the media
input_description: CSV export from a Quid news & blogs network
output_description: Ranked list of key opinion leaders based on metrics such as number of mentions, social engagement, re-publication count, and breadth of influence

title: Cluster​​ Tightness​​ &​​ Cluster​​ Adjacency​​ Scores
description:
​​​‘Cluster​​ Tightness’ ​​​calculates ​​how​​ ‘tight’​​ (focused ​​on​​ one​​ topic)​ ​or ‘dispersed’​​ (focused​​ on​ ​multiple​​ topics) ​​a​​ cluster ​​is.
‘Tightness’​​ score​​ =​​# ​​of ​​intra-cluster​​ links ​​/​​# ​​of​​ nodes​ ​in ​​that ​​cluster​​​
‘Cluster​​ Adjacency’​​​ calculates​​ the ​​strength​​ of​ ​similarity ​​across​​ all​​ combinations of ​​cluster ​​pairs‘
Adjacency’​​ score ​​=​​#​​ of ​​actual​​ inter-cluster ​​links​​/​​#​​of ​​possible​​ inter-cluster ​​links
input_description:
Input 1: CSV​​ export ​​from​​ Quid​​ network
Input 2: JSON file from Quid network
output_description: Zip file containing up to 6 CSVs

title: Ranking​​ Hot ​​Startups ​​& ​​Clusters
description: Excel​​ tool ​​that ​​ranks​​ “hot” companies​​ or​​ clusters ​​based​​ on ​​a combination​​ of​ ​funding​​ metrics ​​and​​ network ​​metrics
input_description:
Input 1: CSV​​ export ​​from​​ Quid​​ companies network
Input 2: Target Event Report
